explains: adj. 共同筹划的，一致的；尽力的，竭力的；（音乐）分声部的
v. 共同议定，协调（concert 的过去式和过去分词形式）
wordGroup: concerted action 一致行动；协同动作
make concerted efforts 共同努力

sentences.en: Their noise modulated to a concerted menacing growl punctuated by sharp yaps.
sentences.cn: 它们的喧闹声逐渐变为整齐划一的、带有威胁性的吼叫，还夹杂着刺耳的狂吠。

sentences.en: He made a concerted effort to win me away from my steady, sweet but boring boyfriend.
sentences.cn: 他作了极大的努力把我从踏实、可爱但令人乏味的男友手中赢走。

sentences.en: Martin Parry, author of the report, says it's time for concerted action by world leaders.
sentences.cn: 这份报道的作者马丁•帕里说是各国领导人采取一致行动的时候了。
